about_the_game:
"Rimland" is a challenging 2D side-scrolling action role-playing game that invites players to explore a mysterious world filled with dangers and wonders. In the game, players can develop their characters, collecting equipment through combat and exploration to enhance their characters’ abilities and strength. The game offers a variety of gameplay, allowing players to experiment with different skill combinations and equipment setups to adapt to various combat scenarios. Each playthrough brings new surprises and challenges, ensuring a unique experience every time. Get ready, and embark on your adventure!

Character Development

Players can develop their own characters and improve characters’ abilities and skills through battle and completing quests.

Loot System

Explore the game world, defeat enemies and bosses to acquire rare equipment and treasures.

Custom Builds

Players can experiment with different combinations of equipment and skills to create unique character builds, adapting to various combat and challenges.

Diverse Characters

Multiple different characters to choose from, each with their own unique skills and development paths.

Exquisite Pixel Art Style

The game features a retro pixel art style, capturing the aesthetic of classic side-scrolling games.

Thrilling Combat

Fast-paced battles and smooth action design provide players with an intense and exciting gaming experience, testing not only their skills but also their combat strategies and build configurations.

name: Rimland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G Series/AMD Athlon™ X4 Series
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Series and above / AMD Ryzen Series and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 600 Series and above / AMD Radeon HD 6000 Series and above
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
